TopicTitle: Button placing landing craft on the floor, in the VAB. Also a button to align crafting in the center of the building (for perfectionists)

Articles.Content: Perhaps not the most necessary feature, but it will add convenience. Add a button that places the craft exactly on the floor in the VAB. Especially if masts are attached to the craft. Because it is not always convenient to do this with the mouse. And it will be even better if a separate or the same button will align the craft exactly in the center of the floor of the vertical assembly building. Only in the horizontal plane. Perfectionists will rejoice!
